mapper.select: select * from course,stu_course where stu_course.studentName = #{studentname} and course.courseId = stu_course.courseId
mapper.insert: insert into course(courseName, courseClass, courseNO, courseYear, courseTerm, member, teacher) values (#{courseName}, #{courseClass}, #{courseNO}, #{courseYear}, #{courseTerm}, 0 , #{teacher})

insert into drawn_course(courseName, courseClass, courseNO, courseYear, courseTerm, member, teacher) values (#{courseName}, #{courseClass}, #{courseNO}, #{courseYear}, #{courseTerm}, #{member} , #{teacher})
mapper.select: select * from drawn_course dc,drawn_student ds where ds.studentName=#{studentName} and ds.courseId = dc.courseId
mapper.delete: delete from drawn_student where courseId= (select courseId from drawn_course where courseName=#{courseName} )
